title: Game freeze??
body:
Twice now while playing poro the game has frozen. The game alone- the mouse and keyboard still worked.
The first time was before the victory screen, I was able to open task manager and close that window, but had to wait to reconnect into the game.
The second time was midgame, could not leave the game screen at all and I was forced to hard restart. Internet did not drop, it just froze. 

Is this due to the game mode itself?

edit: And I've been leavebustered. Great.

replies.body: Hey there, are you running Windows 10?  You might have the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been known to cause freezing like this.  Disabling it should do the trick, but definitely test it in a custom game!

~~I can't seem to find that on my system, and I don't think I have ever used it. But thanks for the suggestion.~~

I found it. I hope that helps. Sigh.

I have the same problem and off Xbox Game Bar not work ;/
